titles.title: Honoring the 2022 World Series Champions-the Houston Astros-and the team's dedicated, iconic manager, Dusty Baker, as well as all of the team's outstanding players who have contributed to making history and proving that anything is possible.

Honoring the 2022 World Series Champions-the Houston Astros-and the team's dedicated, iconic manager, Dusty Baker, as well as all of the team's outstanding players who have contributed to making history and proving that anything is possible.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the 2022 World Series Champion Houston Astros as the world champions of baseball.
